summary: THE VEHICLES POWER WINDOW MOTORS FAILED. THIS RESULTED IN THE PASSENGER SIDE FRONT AND REAR WINDOWS STICKING IN THE HALF WAY DOWN POSITION. THE MOTOR WAS REPLACED BUT THE PROBLEM RECURRED.  *NLM  ALL FOUR WINDOWS HAS HAD REPLACEMENT MOTORS.  THE FRONT PASSENGER WINDOW HAS BEEN REPLACED TWICE.  THERE IS NO WARNING BEFORE FAILURE.  THE MOTORS WERE GM PARTS, ALSO THE REPLACEMENT MOTORS.  SCC
